titles.title: A bill for the relief of James F. and Shirley M. Silva and Walter F. and Mary L. Stuart.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 1/28/1987--Introduced. Directs a redetermination by the Secretary of the Treasury of any tax deficiencies assessed against four named individuals for the taxable years 1973 and 1974.
